Foundations

We know deeply there are certain aspects of life lay a solid foundation for our long-term physical and mental health.

Diet

We can't agree more on how important a good diet is for our health.

Sleep

The most -- maybe the only -- standard for a good sleep: feel replenished when you get up in the morning.

Body-Mind-Connection

Energy level and mood are closely connected. It's hard to have a good mood when you feel tierd.

Story: From sketchings to design iteration

The design of Hyllo started during a quarantine in July of 2021 when I was sitting outdoor seeing the empty street. But the whole idea has been brewing in my head for years. Here's how Hyllo was developed from sketchings to a workable prototype.

Questions you may want to ask about Hyllo

How's Hyllo different from other health apps?
Should I use Hyllo?
Read About page and QAs page.

Minimal stress

One of Hyllo's design principles is "Minimal Stress" -- it tries its best not to add more stress to our already stressful life. Read more design principles or Hyllo.
